SVGAnimatedEnumeration.summary: The SVGAnimatedEnumeration interface describes attribute values which are constants from a particular enumeration and which can be animated.

SVGAnimatedEnumerationBaseVal.summary: The baseVal property of the interface contains the initial value of an SVG enumeration.
SVGAnimatedEnumerationBaseVal.value: An integer containing the initial value of the enumeration

SVGAnimatedEnumerationAnimVal.summary: The animVal property of the interface contains the current value of an SVG enumeration. If there is no animation, it is the same value as the .
SVGAnimatedEnumerationAnimVal.value: An integer containing the current value of the enumeration
